page.title: 02Housing
page.content: Most of our block is farming land,so that there are few houses there.The only built up areas are in the south west ;the most northerly part of Inverurie.To the west of the A96 are the Brandsbutt council estate and several privately developed estates. Brandsbutt houses are built of pre-cast concrete panels surrounding a timber frame.Both roof and outside walls of the upper storey are covered with tiles.The roofs are flat.The private estates were built using kit-houses,most of which are detached or semi-detached. The oldest houses in our block are built of stone and lime or granite and were built during the 19th century following the original linear development of the town.
